content.content: MIP41c5-SP9: Facilitator Offboarding (SH-001)  Preamble MIP41c5-SP#: 9 Author(s): @CodeKnight Contributors: Tags: core-unit, sh-001, cu-offboarding Status: Withdrawn Date Applied: 2022-07-07 Date Ratified:  Forum URL: https://forum.makerdao.com/t/mip41c5-spxx-facilitator-offboarding-sh-001/16439 Ratification Poll URL:  Extra: This proposal has been withdrawn by the author. See here: https://forum.makerdao.com/t/mip40c3-sp76-modify-strategic-happiness-core-unit-budget-sh-001/16438/18).    Sentence Summary The services provided by Strategic Happiness do not require a Core Unit, which requires additional personnel overhead and governance resources.  Motivation See the sister subproposal  to remove the budget from this Core Unit. These services are an unnecessarily high cost in a bear market and can more nimbly and cheaply be carried out without a Core Unit structure. Severance is included in the budget offboarding subproposal for both contributors.  Core Unit ID SH-001
content.GPT-summary: The post is a proposal titled "MIP41c5-SP9: Facilitator Offboarding (SH-001)" that explains the rationale behind the proposal and its status. The author explains that the services provided by Strategic Happiness do not require a Core Unit, which requires additional personnel overhead and governance resources. The post also mentions a sister subproposal to remove the budget from this Core Unit and includes severance for both contributors. A 3rd party could provide constructive criticism or audit and review the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: Thank you for the proposal. While I agree that we need to consider budget adjustments seriously, I encourage the community to share what would be the best way to proceed as there might be some members that support SH but with reduced budget.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: 5 posts were split to a new topic: Should Style of Engagement and Communication be a Facilitator parameter?
CodeKnight:  MIP41c5-SP9: Facilitator Offboarding (IS-001)   Wrong CU-code ser?

This is a summary of the potential impact of this proposal, from GovAlpha’s perspective:  This is a valid offboarding proposal under the currently approved governance process.  MIP40c3-SP76 (Budget Modification) along with MIP41c5-SP9 (Facilitator Offboarding) aims to offboard the Strategic Happiness Core Unit. If the offboarding proposal is ratified, the existing DAI and MKR vesting streams will be cancelled. This proposal asks the Community or SH to propose an adequate severance plan for the contributors. No execution plan is provided. This proposal has been assigned High-Impact based on the methodology listed here.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: Reminder that this proposal will enter its Frozen Period in one week, on Thursday September 1 at 00:00UTC. Substantive modifications beyond that time will render the proposal ineligible for the upcoming Governance Cycle / reset its Frozen Period, as the case may be.
This proposal has been withdrawn by its author.
